title: Rīga adopts 2026 municipal budget
summary_full: Rīga City Council has adopted this year's municipal budget, which was discussed for several hours at Wednesday's council meeting, Latvian Radio reported on 21st January.
summary_public: Rīga City Council has adopted this year's municipal budget, which was discussed for several hours at Wednesday's council meeting, Latvian Radio reported on 21st January.
